errors.error_description: The command to install optional plotting dependencies is incorrect. It uses `[plotting]` instead of the correct extra identifier `[plot]`.
correction_candidates: Replace `pip install umap-learn[plotting]` with `pip install umap-learn[plot]`.
Replace `pip install umap-learn[plotting]` with `pip install umap-learn[plots]`.
Replace `pip install umap-learn[plotting]` with `pip install umap-learn matplotlib datashader holoviews`.
errors.golden_answer: Replace `pip install umap-learn[plotting]` with `pip install umap-learn[plot]`.
